body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bryant Motors. My name is William Bryant. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Evelyn Butler.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Evelyn. Can you please provide me with your phone number as well as your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven one four two three five eight nine six seven, and my email address is evelyn.butler@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Evelyn. We appreciate your cooperation. Can you also provide your postal address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my postal address is one two three Maple Street, Cityville, State Name, five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your address, Evelyn. We can now proceed with addressing your concern. What seems to be the issue you're facing with our customer service?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling sad because of the lack of communication and delay in response from the customer service team.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Evelyn. We will work on resolving this issue promptly. Thank you for sharing your feedback; it helps us improve our services. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we conclude our conversation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance, William.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Evelyn. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further inquiries, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day.
